title: Core Permitting Schema
description: This data specification provides a standard list of values for Natural Resource Sector core permitting data.

project_linking_id.description: A unique key to track all permits related to a project or activity from all permitting systems.

project_name.description: Short name of the project, e.g., The Hudson, Capitol Hill.

project_description.description: Full description of the project. This field may contain information to better understand a project

project_location_description.description: A short description for the geographical location or area of interest of the project.

physical_address.description: This is the physical address if provided for a project.

region_name.description: Natural Resource administrative boundary associated with the physical project location.

agency.description: Acronym for the agency or ministry issuing the permit.

business_domain.description: Business domain, office or area responsible for the permit.

source_system_acronym.description: Acronym for the source system providing the permit tracking.

application_id.description: Unique ID of the submitted application for a permit.

application_name.description: Name of the application for a permit.

application_type.description: The form type for a permit or licence application.

application_tracking_state.description: Tracking state of an application in progress.

application_status.description: Status of the application to obtain a permit

permit_id.description: A permit specific ID used to identify the issued permit id. A meaningful number/code used by the business area to identify the permit.

permit_name.description: The business domain permit name type
enum: Change approval for work in and about a stream
Notification of authorized changes in and about a stream

permit_application_type.description: The form type for a permit or licence application

received_date.description: Date in which the application for permit was submitted

accepted_date.description: Date in which the review of the initial application's completeness concludes

tech_review_completion_date.description: Date in which the technical team concludes their review of the application

rejected_date.description: Date in which the permit is rejected

adjudication_date.description: Date in which the permit is adjudicated, approved or issued

amendment_date.description: Date in which the permit is amended

fn_consultn_start_date.description: Date in which the consultation with First Nations starts

fn_consultn_completion_date.description: Date in which the consultation with First Nations ends
